# The attempt to place the stone furnace has failed because the target position is too far from my current location.
# 
# I need to move closer to the iron ore patch to place the stone furnace. Since I am currently at (0, 0), I will move to a position that is within the allowable range for placing the furnace.
# 
# I will move to a position that is closer to the iron ore patch, specifically around (x=-16, y=26), which should be within the maximum distance for placement.

move_to(Position(x=-16, y=26))  # Moving closer to the iron ore patch for furnace placement.
